meta.name: Shai-Hulud Attack - Banned npm Packages
meta.description: Complete list of npm packages compromised during the Shai-Hulud supply chain attacks (Original: September 2025, Shai-Hulud 2.0: November 2025)

banned_packages.name: @ctrl/deluge
banned_packages.description: Popular torrent client library with 2.2M weekly downloads

banned_packages.name: rxnt-authentication
banned_packages.description: Patient Zero - First package compromised in the Shai-Hulud attack

banned_packages.name: ngx-bootstrap
banned_packages.description: Angular Bootstrap components with 300K weekly downloads

banned_packages.name: @ctrl/tinycolor
banned_packages.description: Color manipulation library with massive reach

immediate_actions: Remove all banned packages immediately: npm uninstall <package-name>
Clear npm cache: npm cache clean --force
Delete node_modules: rm -rf node_modules && npm install
investigation_steps: Check GitHub for public repos named 'Shai-Hulud'
Scan for malicious GitHub Actions workflows
